name: sinfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is against the rules of a religion or morally wrong: Even those projects that were successful were sinfully wasteful. They can't perceive that they are acting hypocritically and sinfully.
informal in a way that is bad for you, but enjoyable: These brownies are sinfully delicious. The book is wickedly, sinfully entertaining. See
sinful
